tags: chris evans x plus size reader
title: One shot: Apples, pt. 2
body:
Requested?    Yes  l   No

Originally requested by: my muse @ticklikeabomb

Now requested by: Y’all

Pairing: Chris Evans x Caucasian plus sized reader

Original summary: Hi love ❤️Could I request one with Caucasian Plus size reader x Chris Evans, please? For the ones who don’t know, our Daddy Evans was dumped at prom 😞. I was wondering if I could get one, where that girl from prom comes back into his life an Chris leaves Reader for her, based on the song « Apples » by Lily Allen, in Chris’s Pov. Thank you 💙

First part

Warning(s): language, crying

Word count: 1217

Picture(s) found on: Pinterest/Google


“Gosh, you’re so fucking exhausting to deal with!” André, your boyfriend shouted while throwing his hands in the air, his eyes glaring into yours while you bit your lip and shook your head, anger pumping through your body.

“No, I am not! You’re a fucking disrespectful man who doesn’t know how to treat women right!” you argued back, the memories of him flirting with the waitress during your date earlier flashing past your eyes. You and André had been together for four months but you didn’t even know what had convinced you to get together with him because you had been miserable even since.

It had been six months since Chris had left you for Vanessa, the girl who had broken his heart the night before their prom. The pain and disappointment you felt was the worst thing you had ever felt in your life. You loved Chris with your whole heart and it was a harsh blow to have him dump you like a bag of trash for someone who just wanted him for fame.

You hadn’t really let yourself hurt and cry over the failed relationship: You distracted yourself with work and new hobbies and didn’t allow yourself to cry the disgusting pain in your heart out. What Chris had done had changed the way you thought and felt about love. Suddenly, seeing happy couples disgusted you and you distanced yourself from your friends who were in serious relationships, not being able to look them in the face while knowing that they had somebody who truly loved them.

Despite that you weren’t the biggest fan of love, you through yourself out in the dating world in order to try to get Chris out of your mind. A few weeks later, you randomly met André at the grocery store and felt attracted to him because he was the total opposite of Chris: He barely showed his interest in you when you began to date, didn’t make any effort in surprising you with romantic and sweet gestures to show his appreciation for you and certainly didn’t flaunt you as his girlfriend to the whole world.

Your inner goddess was had been locked in a cave and had to watch you let yourself get disrespected by André. The four months you had spent with him only made you realize that no other man was able to make you feel as special as Chris had. But every time he crossed your mind, you shook your head and continued to let your boyfriend disrespect you.

Your prediction about Vanessa had come true a few weeks ago. An audio record about her bragging about the attention and business deals she had received since having become Chris’s girlfriend got leaked by one of her enemies. You had thought that that would be the ultimate thing you’d need in order to move on from Chris, but were disappointed when you ended up crying your eyes out on the bathroom floor as you realized that you felt bad for him and still loved him very much.

Vanessa quickly got dragged through the mud, lost her business deals and desperately tried to clear her image with a dishonest apology posted on her Instagram account. She had gotten what she deserved but that didn’t matter to you anymore, you were a complete mess and had lost touch with head, heart and soul.

 

“You know what?!” you cut André off as he was in the middle of cussing you out, “What?!” he hissed while continuing to glare at you. You let out a few deep breaths while feeling the bottled-up emotions from the past six months course through your body, resulting in thick tears cascading down your cheeks and blurring your vision.

“I’m so fucking done with you” you whispered and sniffled loudly, storming your way to the front door of Andre’s house while he yelled “You’re not! You’re gonna beg for a second chance in a few days!” making you roll your eyes while you opened the door and rushed down the front porch onto the street, ignoring the weird glances you received from people walking by.

“Fucking idiot. Stupid me” you cried to yourself while walking down the street, desperate to find some private place you could quickly shed a few tears before having to order an Uber to get to your apartment.

Your heart was aching heavily in your chest while you walked past a random café, catching a glimpse of yourself in the reflection of the window and holding your breath for a second. You looked horrible, the pain you had been trying to hide for months was now clouding your eyes while the exhausting of your toxic relationship was scattered all over your face and posture.

“Wow” was all you were able to croak out, not wanting to believe how you had drastically changed for the worst. You blinked a few times while clearing your throat, not knowing what to think of while continued to stare at your reflection.

Suddenly, some movements behind the window made you focus on what was going on inside the café and made you gasp loudly upon seeing Chris sitting not too far away from the window and staring directly at you. Your heart sank to the pit of your stomach while you quickly turned away and jogged your way down the street while getting your phone out of your pocket.

Your hands were shaking while you tried to order an Uber, not paying attention when running across the street while a car was approaching you at a dangerously quick pace.

“Watch out!” somebody yelled behind you before pulling you back by the arm, their harsh grip making you drop your phone and watch it get run over by the car that had almost hit you, the glass shattered all over the ground while the harsh pounding of your heart echoed in your ears.

Loud pants left your lips as reality slowly hit you: you had almost lost your life.

Soft sobs left your lips while the tears blurred your vision again, the stranger behind you slowly turning you around and engulfing you in a tight hug, a hug that felt very familiar and soothing.

“It’s okay” Chris whispered while placing a tender kiss on top of your head, his heart pounding in his chest as the traumatic images of you almost getting hit by a car flashing past his eyes. His hands were trembling while your body shook from all the crying.

“Let’s get you somewhere safe” your ex-boyfriend then muttered while gently leading you to his car that was parked not too far away down the street. He ignored the weird stares the two of you received, your health being his only concern at the moment.

Once you had reached his car, Chris helped you get into the passenger’s seat and made sure that your seat belt was fastened before quickly getting into the driver’s seat and starting the engine, shaky breaths leaving his lips as he still was trying to process what had happened.

All you could do was stare down at your intertwined fingers while continuing to sob to yourself, silently wondering how long you’d continue to feel so broken and defeated while Chris drove the two of you to your once shared house.

-Emmanuelle 💋❤️

You looked horrible, the pain you had been trying to hide for months was now clouding your eyes while the exhausting of your toxic relationship was scattered all over your face and posture.

“Wow” was all you were able to croak out, not wanting to believe how you had drastically changed for the worst. You blinked a few times while clearing your throat, not knowing what to think of while continued to stare at your reflection.

Suddenly, some movements behind the window made you focus on what was going on inside the café and made you gasp loudly upon seeing Chris sitting not too far away from the window and staring directly at you. Your heart sank to the pit of your stomach while you quickly turned away and jogged your way down the street while getting your phone out of your pocket.

Your hands were shaking while you tried to order an Uber, not paying attention when running across the street while a car was approaching you at a dangerously quick pace.

“Watch out!” somebody yelled behind you before pulling you back by the arm, their harsh grip making you drop your phone and watch it get run over by the car that had almost hit you, the glass shattered all over the ground while the harsh pounding of your heart echoed in your ears.

Loud pants left your lips as reality slowly hit you: you had almost lost your life.

Soft sobs left your lips while the tears blurred your vision again, the stranger behind you slowly turning you around and engulfing you in a tight hug, a hug that felt very familiar and soothing.

“It’s okay” Chris whispered while placing a tender kiss on top of your head, his heart pounding in his chest as the traumatic images of you almost getting hit by a car flashing past his eyes. His hands were trembling while your body shook from all the crying.

“Let’s get you somewhere safe” your ex-boyfriend then muttered while gently leading you to his car that was parked not too far away down the street. He ignored the weird stares the two of you received, your health being his only concern at the moment.

Once you had reached his car, Chris helped you get into the passenger’s seat and made sure that your seat belt was fastened before quickly getting into the driver’s seat and starting the engine, shaky breaths leaving his lips as he still was trying to process what had happened.

All you could do was stare down at your intertwined fingers while continuing to sob to yourself, silently wondering how long you’d continue to feel so broken and defeated while Chris drove the two of you to your once shared house.

Now requested by: Y’all

Pairing: Chris Evans x Caucasian plus sized reader

Original summary: Hi love ❤️Could I request one with Caucasian Plus size reader x Chris Evans, please? For the ones who don’t know, our Daddy Evans was dumped at prom 😞. I was wondering if I could get one, where that girl from prom comes back into his life an Chris leaves Reader for her, based on the song « Apples » by Lily Allen, in Chris’s Pov. Thank you 💙

First part

Warning(s): language, crying

Word count: 1217

Picture(s) found on: Pinterest/Google


“Gosh, you’re so fucking exhausting to deal with!” André, your boyfriend shouted while throwing his hands in the air, his eyes glaring into yours while you bit your lip and shook your head, anger pumping through your body.

“No, I am not! You’re a fucking disrespectful man who doesn’t know how to treat women right!” you argued back, the memories of him flirting with the waitress during your date earlier flashing past your eyes. You and André had been together for four months but you didn’t even know what had convinced you to get together with him because you had been miserable even since.

It had been six months since Chris had left you for Vanessa, the girl who had broken his heart the night before their prom. The pain and disappointment you felt was the worst thing you had ever felt in your life. You loved Chris with your whole heart and it was a harsh blow to have him dump you like a bag of trash for someone who just wanted him for fame.

You hadn’t really let yourself hurt and cry over the failed relationship: You distracted yourself with work and new hobbies and didn’t allow yourself to cry the disgusting pain in your heart out. What Chris had done had changed the way you thought and felt about love. Suddenly, seeing happy couples disgusted you and you distanced yourself from your friends who were in serious relationships, not being able to look them in the face while knowing that they had somebody who truly loved them.

Despite that you weren’t the biggest fan of love, you through yourself out in the dating world in order to try to get Chris out of your mind. A few weeks later, you randomly met André at the grocery store and felt attracted to him because he was the total opposite of Chris: He barely showed his interest in you when you began to date, didn’t make any effort in surprising you with romantic and sweet gestures to show his appreciation for you and certainly didn’t flaunt you as his girlfriend to the whole world.

Your inner goddess was had been locked in a cave and had to watch you let yourself get disrespected by André. The four months you had spent with him only made you realize that no other man was able to make you feel as special as Chris had. But every time he crossed your mind, you shook your head and continued to let your boyfriend disrespect you.

Your prediction about Vanessa had come true a few weeks ago. An audio record about her bragging about the attention and business deals she had received since having become Chris’s girlfriend got leaked by one of her enemies. You had thought that that would be the ultimate thing you’d need in order to move on from Chris, but were disappointed when you ended up crying your eyes out on the bathroom floor as you realized that you felt bad for him and still loved him very much.

Vanessa quickly got dragged through the mud, lost her business deals and desperately tried to clear her image with a dishonest apology posted on her Instagram account. She had gotten what she deserved but that didn’t matter to you anymore, you were a complete mess and had lost touch with head, heart and soul.

 

“You know what?!” you cut André off as he was in the middle of cussing you out, “What?!” he hissed while continuing to glare at you. You let out a few deep breaths while feeling the bottled-up emotions from the past six months course through your body, resulting in thick tears cascading down your cheeks and blurring your vision.

“I’m so fucking done with you” you whispered and sniffled loudly, storming your way to the front door of Andre’s house while he yelled “You’re not! You’re gonna beg for a second chance in a few days!” making you roll your eyes while you opened the door and rushed down the front porch onto the street, ignoring the weird glances you received from people walking by.

“Fucking idiot. Stupid me” you cried to yourself while walking down the street, desperate to find some private place you could quickly shed a few tears before having to order an Uber to get to your apartment.

Your heart was aching heavily in your chest while you walked past a random café, catching a glimpse of yourself in the reflection of the window and holding your breath for a second. You looked horrible, the pain you had been trying to hide for months was now clouding your eyes while the exhausting of your toxic relationship was scattered all over your face and posture.

“Wow” was all you were able to croak out, not wanting to believe how you had drastically changed for the worst. You blinked a few times while clearing your throat, not knowing what to think of while continued to stare at your reflection.

Suddenly, some movements behind the window made you focus on what was going on inside the café and made you gasp loudly upon seeing Chris sitting not too far away from the window and staring directly at you. Your heart sank to the pit of your stomach while you quickly turned away and jogged your way down the street while getting your phone out of your pocket.

Your hands were shaking while you tried to order an Uber, not paying attention when running across the street while a car was approaching you at a dangerously quick pace.

“Watch out!” somebody yelled behind you before pulling you back by the arm, their harsh grip making you drop your phone and watch it get run over by the car that had almost hit you, the glass shattered all over the ground while the harsh pounding of your heart echoed in your ears.

Loud pants left your lips as reality slowly hit you: you had almost lost your life.

Soft sobs left your lips while the tears blurred your vision again, the stranger behind you slowly turning you around and engulfing you in a tight hug, a hug that felt very familiar and soothing.

“It’s okay” Chris whispered while placing a tender kiss on top of your head, his heart pounding in his chest as the traumatic images of you almost getting hit by a car flashing past his eyes. His hands were trembling while your body shook from all the crying.

“Let’s get you somewhere safe” your ex-boyfriend then muttered while gently leading you to his car that was parked not too far away down the street. He ignored the weird stares the two of you received, your health being his only concern at the moment.

Once you had reached his car, Chris helped you get into the passenger’s seat and made sure that your seat belt was fastened before quickly getting into the driver’s seat and starting the engine, shaky breaths leaving his lips as he still was trying to process what had happened.

All you could do was stare down at your intertwined fingers while continuing to sob to yourself, silently wondering how long you’d continue to feel so broken and defeated while Chris drove the two of you to your once shared house.

title: Headcanon: Appreciation
body:
Requested?    Yes  l   No

By: anonymous

Pairing: Chris Evans x Black plus sized reader

Summary: Imagine Chris Evans asking his S/O whos black about there haircare routine and one day when he’s at an interview the interviewer ask if there’s a difference now that he’s in an interracial relationship and he’s like now I understand black women’s hair care👑

Warning(s): none

Word count: 588

Picture(s) found on: Pinterest/Google


-When you and Chris got together, he was mesmerized by you. Every day, he learned something new about your personality and culture. But your haircare routine was something that always left him intrigued and awestruck

-Chris loved when you walked around with your natural hair, the delicate smells of your conditioners and moisturizers leaving him tempted to bury his face in your hair. He often sat in the corner of the bathroom and watched you go through with your wash day or sometimes helped you rinse out the conditioner while loving the feeling of your soft hair running through his fingers

-You loved how observant and interested Chris was in learning all about your haircare routine, loved him more when he started to remember the brands you were using and then bought them when he noticed that the bottles were almost empty

-One day during an interview, Chris got asked if he felt any difference now that he was dating a black woman. The question caught him off guard as no one had ever asked him that, but after he composed himself, he cleared his throat and smiled

-“Yes, I’ve learned a lot about the black culture. Especially the about the hair and the effort and commitment it takes to take good care of it” he responds, making the interviewer raise their eyebrow as she was very impressed by his response

-“It’s fascinating and so inspiring to see how [Y/N] takes such good care of her hair with all the products she uses. I would have never known how much time and effort it takes to either have bouncy curls, long and soft waves or a thick afro if it wasn’t for [Y/N]” Chris finished with a smile on his face, you lingering in the back of his mind

-You watched the live interview from the couch in your shared apartment and were so proud of your boyfriend. You almost lost it when he actually started doing shout out to the product brands you were using, making your social media notifications shoot through the roof as his fans were now asking where you were purchasing the hair products for a decent price

-After the interview, Chris arrived at your shared apartment and laughed when he found you in the bathroom, taking pictures of all your hair products and sending them to his fans through direct message on Instagram and Twitter

-“Oh no, what have I done?” Chris chuckled as he joined you on the bathroom floor and helped you taking the pictures. You chuckled and gave him a sweet kiss on the lips that made him crave for much more while you showed him the messages his fans were sending you

-“You just helped a lot of black women find the right products for their hair, babe. And I’m so proud of you” you smiled before finished taking the pictures and then posting them on your Instagram, tagging the brands and stores who sold the products

-Once you were done, you led your boyfriend to the bedroom and removed your headscarf. Chris smiled when you straddled his lap while he sat at the edge of the bed, his arms snaking themselves around your thick waist

-“Hearing you talk about my hair turned me on” you whispered in his ear before leaving soft kisses up and down his neck, earning a few low grunts and moans from your boyfriend. “Shit, then I should talk about it more often” he chuckled before capturing your soft lips in a sensual kiss

-Once you were done, you led your boyfriend to the bedroom and removed your headscarf. Chris smiled when you straddled his lap while he sat at the edge of the bed, his arms snaking themselves around your thick waist

-“Hearing you talk about my hair turned me on” you whispered in his ear before leaving soft kisses up and down his neck, earning a few low grunts and moans from your boyfriend. “Shit, then I should talk about it more often” he chuckled before capturing your soft lips in a sensual kiss

title: THE SOLDIER AND HIS CAPTAIN  (4/6)
body:
Summary: It’s your first day at the academy where you’ll become a soldier.  The academy is already difficult but even more so when you are a woman and you have Sergeant Hanks as Captain, luckily another captain will help you overcome the challenges. I’m very bad with  summaries, just give it a try.  English is my third language so im sorry if there’s any misspelling.

Pairing(s): Steve Rogers x Reader

PART 1 PART 2 PART 3




Your whole body hurts from yesterday’s exercise. You had fallen asleep so you had missed breakfast, thankfully Lily brought you something to eat.
You just wanted to stay in bed but today you had an important meeting. Everyone stand up when Captain Rogers enters the room. As soon as you see him, the memory of the blonde woman in his bed comes to you. God, you have to forget about him.
“Today we have a new mission, these men” Several photos of men appear on the screen “they are planning an attack in New York, our mission is to infiltrate and discover where they intend to attack, these men will be in different buildings so we will form pairs and we’ll infiltrate, we don’t want to attract  attention, if you see that you are going to be discovered you abort the mission” he takes a moment before continuing “Frank, Josh, Mark and Joey this man will be your target, in this file you have all the information you will need, Lily, you will go with Sam, he will inform you of everything”
“who’s Sam?” Lily asks.
“Sam Wilson, he will help us in this mission” Steve explains.
“OMG i’m going to a mission with Falcon” Lily says excitedly.
“And Y/N you’ll go with me” He gives you a file “here you have all the information” Great, how are you supposed to forget about him if you have to spend the night with him? “he will be at a party at his house, I left a dress in your room … Natasha has chosen it, I think it will be your size”
“I’m going to read the report” Great now you have to wear the dress that the girlfriend has chosen for you.
“I’ll pick you up in 20 minutes, we’ll talk about the details on the way to the party” he says before going to talk to other soldiers. 


“I can’t believe I’m going on a mission with Sam Wilson!!!” Lily screams when she enters the room.

“I did not know you were a fan” you say.

“he’s hot” She stops when she sees you “you look amazing!”
“thanks” Captain America’s girlfriend has good taste, It is a bit tight and short of what you are used to but it is beautiful.
“You’ll have Steve Rogers distracted all night” You were going to say something when someone knocked on your door.
“Y/N are you… ready?” Steve seems surprised when you open the door.
“yes, i’m ready for the mission” you say grabbing your bag
“good”  he says and you would have sworn to have seen him blush.
“be careful” You hug Lily before leaving
“Don’t worry, she’ll be fine, she’ll be with Sam” Steve smiles at you as he opens the car door for you. The party must be close if he was driving.
“so… what’s the plan?” you asks.
“we are a couple” You almost choke when you hear him say that but he continues explaining the plan “here I have the invitations for the party at his house, in his office he has to have the plans of where he wants to attack, once we know where, we leave”
“sounds good” you say looking out the window, it seems that his mission is to torture you, you try to forget him but you can’t do it if you have to act like his girlfriend.

40 minutes later you arrive at the party.
“Are you sure they won’t recognize you?” you say getting out of the car, Steve had dyed his hair dark, people usually know him blind and without a beard but he had been letting his beard grow for weeks, maybe for this mission.
“I guess we’re going to find out” Steve puts his arm so you can grab him. Steve was right, they didn’t recognize him.
“this house is huge where do we start?” you say it in a low voice.
“we have to dance first" He says surprising you.
"what?" 
"we have to act normally, we can’t arrive and start looking, we have to be seen together” he explains.



The room was full of couples dancing, Steve places his hand on your waist and you put yours around his neck.
“I had never danced like that” you admit.
“Just follow my steps, it’s easy” he says smiling seeing you nervous “you look beautiful Y/N” he says.
“Your girlfriend has good taste” You say jealous.
“my girlfriend?” He says confused.
“Natasha” you say still dancing.
“she’s not my girlfriend, she’s the black widow” he says with a big smile.
“she’s not? wait… you mean the black widow?” God, you are stupid.
“Did you think she was my girlfriend?  Banner would kill me” Having this conversation while you were dancing with him was not a good idea. You were sure you were flushed “but your right, she has good taste, that dress suits you very well”
“It’s a little short for my liking” you see how Steve bites his lip when you talk about how short the dress is.
“you’re perfect…the dress, the dress is perfect” he explains quickly “They have already seen us dance, we have to … find his office” he says taking a step back.
“Of course, the mission…” For a moment you had forgotten the real reason why you were dancing with him.

You and Steve go upstairs where the rooms were. You enter several rooms but you can’t find anything, at least until you enter the last room, his office.
“we have to hurry” he says searching in his desk.
“Wait, there is something here” you say and Steve approaches you “information about the hours with the most passengers in Grand Central Station, there are pictures of the whole station….the security cameras and the guards are marked with an x”
“We already know where they are going to attack, but when?” Steve asks next to you.
“i don’t know…” You were looking for more information when you hear the door open. You don’t give Steve a chance to say anything when you kiss him. He only takes a second to surround you with his arms and correspond the kiss.
“what are you doing here? You can’t be here” says the man you’re investigating.
“oh my god…” You say embarrassed walking away from Steve “We just wanted to be alone, you know” You say acting.
“get out” he says angry.
“Sorry about this, we’re leaving” Steve speaks for the first time. Steve takes your hand to leave the room and does not let go until you get in the car.

“that was close…” you say to Steve.
“luckily for us you think fast”
“yeah… about that…i’m sorry i just…” you start to say.
“No, It was a good kiss”  You see how Steve blushes when he realizes what he has said “i mean that it was a good idea”
“yeah… it was” you say biting your lip, now it was going to be impossible to forget him, not after that kiss “At least now we know where they are going to attack”
“yes, but we don’t know when” he says with a frown.
“Actually … I think I know when they will attack” He looks at you surprised “I found a train ticket for the 27th and that date was marked on the desk calendar” you explain.
“you are amazing Y/N” You have never seen him smile like that.
The rest of the trip to the base you spend it in silence, you don’t know what he is thinking about, but you can’t stop thinking about that kiss.
“You’ve been incredible tonight, thanks to you we’re going to avoid the attack"  he says opening the car door.
"save lives, that’s our job….good night Captain Rogers” You say closing the door.

Steve was going to take care of delivering the information that you had found so you go to your room where Lily was already waiting for you.
“OMG Y/N i think i’m in love with Sam” she says when you enter.
“what? what happend with the mission?”
“the mission went well, we don’t know where they are going to attack but we know where the bombs come from but there was a man who was bothering me and before I could show him my fist “she smiles” Sam starts hitting him, it was the hottest thing I’ve ever seen in my life” she says fanning himself with her hands.
“Are you drunk?” Her breath smelled of alcohol.
“Noo…Well a little bit” she says laughing “Sam insisted we had to celebrate”
“Okey, why don’t you go to bed? we’ll talk tomorrow” You say covering her with a blanket. Two seconds later she was already snoring. You were jealous of how easy she falls asleep,  because once again you were in the training room practicing your punches. You couldn’t stop thinking about that kiss, how you felt when you were in his arms.



“we have to stop meeting here” Steve says scaring you.
“shit… you scared me”
“language” he says with a smile.
“what are you doing here?”  you dry the sweat on your forehead.
“i culdn’t sleep” he says.
“me neither… Lily is drunk”
“Sam is also drunk, I’ve left him sleeping in my room, I think Sam likes Lily” he says.
“i know for sure that Lily likes Sam…. but that would be inappropriate, we can’t have relationships with superiors.” You almost want to laugh at the situation, talking about the feelings of others instead of yours.
“What a stupid rule” Steve was staring at you.
“lenguage” you joke.
“I had a great time tonight, it’s been a long time since I danced with someone” he says.
“I had a great time too” You remain silent, It seems that he wanted to tell you something but seeing that he doesn’t say anything…. “I leave you alone so you can train” you add.
“actually… i wanted to ask you…” Steve seems nervous  "the thing is that…The other day Nat gave me some advice and I think I should listen to her"
“okay…” yo say confussed.
“At times like these I would like to be able to get drunk” Suddenly Steve shortens the distance that separates you and kisses you , the kiss was short but intense “I’m sorry if…” but you shut him with a kiss, this time the kiss is more intense, he clings to your body as if you were to disappear if he let go.
“I’ve been wanting to do this for a long time” you admit.



“me too… I know I shouldn’t feel this way, I’m your superior and there are rules … but I can’t help it, since I saw you the first day I can’t stop thinking about you” He says before kissing you again.
“What impressed you the most, that I couldn’t do the push-ups that Captain Hanks ordered or the beating that Frank gave me?” you say biting your lip.
“I had to control myself to not throw him against the wall when I separated him from you” he says caressing your face.
“so… what now?” you asks.
“We have to see each other in secret, at least until the end of this year….if you want this … well, I should have asked and not take it for granted ….” he says nervously, apparently Steve Rogers speaks fast when he is nervous.
“yes…we won’t tell anyone” You caress his cheek before kissing him.
“Today has been a long day, you should go to bed” he kisses you “I’ll see you tomorrow in training” he says before kissing you again and you cant help but smile, Steve Rogers was kissing you, how was it possible?
“good night Captain Rogers” you say goodbye to him, when you get to your room you’re still smiling, thank goodness that Lily is still asleep or you could not hide that stupid smile.



MASTERLIST 


Part 5

“At times like these I would like to be able to get drunk” Suddenly Steve shortens the distance that separates you and kisses you , the kiss was short but intense “I’m sorry if…” but you shut him with a kiss, this time the kiss is more intense, he clings to your body as if you were to disappear if he let go.
“I’ve been wanting to do this for a long time” you admit.



“me too… I know I shouldn’t feel this way, I’m your superior and there are rules … but I can’t help it, since I saw you the first day I can’t stop thinking about you” He says before kissing you again.
“What impressed you the most, that I couldn’t do the push-ups that Captain Hanks ordered or the beating that Frank gave me?” you say biting your lip.
“I had to control myself to not throw him against the wall when I separated him from you” he says caressing your face.
“so… what now?” you asks.
“We have to see each other in secret, at least until the end of this year….if you want this … well, I should have asked and not take it for granted ….” he says nervously, apparently Steve Rogers speaks fast when he is nervous.
“yes…we won’t tell anyone” You caress his cheek before kissing him.
“Today has been a long day, you should go to bed” he kisses you “I’ll see you tomorrow in training” he says before kissing you again and you cant help but smile, Steve Rogers was kissing you, how was it possible?
“good night Captain Rogers” you say goodbye to him, when you get to your room you’re still smiling, thank goodness that Lily is still asleep or you could not hide that stupid smile.

trail.content_raw:
Summary: It’s your first day at the academy where you’ll become a soldier.  The academy is already difficult but even more so when you are a woman and you have Sergeant Hanks as Captain, luckily another captain will help you overcome the challenges. I’m very bad with  summaries, just give it a try.  English is my third language so im sorry if there’s any misspelling.

Pairing(s): Steve Rogers x Reader

PART 1 PART 2 PART 3




Your whole body hurts from yesterday’s exercise. You had fallen asleep so you had missed breakfast, thankfully Lily brought you something to eat.
You just wanted to stay in bed but today you had an important meeting. Everyone stand up when Captain Rogers enters the room. As soon as you see him, the memory of the blonde woman in his bed comes to you. God, you have to forget about him.
“Today we have a new mission, these men” Several photos of men appear on the screen “they are planning an attack in New York, our mission is to infiltrate and discover where they intend to attack, these men will be in different buildings so we will form pairs and we’ll infiltrate, we don’t want to attract  attention, if you see that you are going to be discovered you abort the mission” he takes a moment before continuing “Frank, Josh, Mark and Joey this man will be your target, in this file you have all the information you will need, Lily, you will go with Sam, he will inform you of everything”
“who’s Sam?” Lily asks.
“Sam Wilson, he will help us in this mission” Steve explains.
“OMG i’m going to a mission with Falcon” Lily says excitedly.
“And Y/N you’ll go with me” He gives you a file “here you have all the information” Great, how are you supposed to forget about him if you have to spend the night with him? “he will be at a party at his house, I left a dress in your room … Natasha has chosen it, I think it will be your size”
“I’m going to read the report” Great now you have to wear the dress that the girlfriend has chosen for you.
“I’ll pick you up in 20 minutes, we’ll talk about the details on the way to the party” he says before going to talk to other soldiers. 

[[MORE]]


“I can’t believe I’m going on a mission with Sam Wilson!!!” Lily screams when she enters the room.

“I did not know you were a fan” you say.

“he’s hot” She stops when she sees you “you look amazing!”
“thanks” Captain America’s girlfriend has good taste, It is a bit tight and short of what you are used to but it is beautiful.
“You’ll have Steve Rogers distracted all night” You were going to say something when someone knocked on your door.
“Y/N are you… ready?” Steve seems surprised when you open the door.
“yes, i’m ready for the mission” you say grabbing your bag
“good”  he says and you would have sworn to have seen him blush.
“be careful” You hug Lily before leaving
“Don’t worry, she’ll be fine, she’ll be with Sam” Steve smiles at you as he opens the car door for you. The party must be close if he was driving.
“so… what’s the plan?” you asks.
“we are a couple” You almost choke when you hear him say that but he continues explaining the plan “here I have the invitations for the party at his house, in his office he has to have the plans of where he wants to attack, once we know where, we leave”
“sounds good” you say looking out the window, it seems that his mission is to torture you, you try to forget him but you can’t do it if you have to act like his girlfriend.

40 minutes later you arrive at the party.
“Are you sure they won’t recognize you?” you say getting out of the car, Steve had dyed his hair dark, people usually know him blind and without a beard but he had been letting his beard grow for weeks, maybe for this mission.
“I guess we’re going to find out” Steve puts his arm so you can grab him. Steve was right, they didn’t recognize him.
“this house is huge where do we start?” you say it in a low voice.
“we have to dance first" He says surprising you.
"what?" 
"we have to act normally, we can’t arrive and start looking, we have to be seen together” he explains.



The room was full of couples dancing, Steve places his hand on your waist and you put yours around his neck.
“I had never danced like that” you admit.
“Just follow my steps, it’s easy” he says smiling seeing you nervous “you look beautiful Y/N” he says.
“Your girlfriend has good taste” You say jealous.
“my girlfriend?” He says confused.
“Natasha” you say still dancing.
“she’s not my girlfriend, she’s the black widow” he says with a big smile.
“she’s not? wait… you mean the black widow?” God, you are stupid.
“Did you think she was my girlfriend?  Banner would kill me” Having this conversation while you were dancing with him was not a good idea. You were sure you were flushed “but your right, she has good taste, that dress suits you very well”
“It’s a little short for my liking” you see how Steve bites his lip when you talk about how short the dress is.
“you’re perfect…the dress, the dress is perfect” he explains quickly “They have already seen us dance, we have to … find his office” he says taking a step back.
“Of course, the mission…” For a moment you had forgotten the real reason why you were dancing with him.

You and Steve go upstairs where the rooms were. You enter several rooms but you can’t find anything, at least until you enter the last room, his office.
“we have to hurry” he says searching in his desk.
“Wait, there is something here” you say and Steve approaches you “information about the hours with the most passengers in Grand Central Station, there are pictures of the whole station….the security cameras and the guards are marked with an x”
“We already know where they are going to attack, but when?” Steve asks next to you.
“i don’t know…” You were looking for more information when you hear the door open. You don’t give Steve a chance to say anything when you kiss him. He only takes a second to surround you with his arms and correspond the kiss.
“what are you doing here? You can’t be here” says the man you’re investigating.
“oh my god…” You say embarrassed walking away from Steve “We just wanted to be alone, you know” You say acting.
“get out” he says angry.
“Sorry about this, we’re leaving” Steve speaks for the first time. Steve takes your hand to leave the room and does not let go until you get in the car.

“that was close…” you say to Steve.
“luckily for us you think fast”
“yeah… about that…i’m sorry i just…” you start to say.
“No, It was a good kiss”  You see how Steve blushes when he realizes what he has said “i mean that it was a good idea”
“yeah… it was” you say biting your lip, now it was going to be impossible to forget him, not after that kiss “At least now we know where they are going to attack”
“yes, but we don’t know when” he says with a frown.
“Actually … I think I know when they will attack” He looks at you surprised “I found a train ticket for the 27th and that date was marked on the desk calendar” you explain.
“you are amazing Y/N” You have never seen him smile like that.
The rest of the trip to the base you spend it in silence, you don’t know what he is thinking about, but you can’t stop thinking about that kiss.
“You’ve been incredible tonight, thanks to you we’re going to avoid the attack"  he says opening the car door.
"save lives, that’s our job….good night Captain Rogers” You say closing the door.

Steve was going to take care of delivering the information that you had found so you go to your room where Lily was already waiting for you.
“OMG Y/N i think i’m in love with Sam” she says when you enter.
“what? what happend with the mission?”
“the mission went well, we don’t know where they are going to attack but we know where the bombs come from but there was a man who was bothering me and before I could show him my fist “she smiles” Sam starts hitting him, it was the hottest thing I’ve ever seen in my life” she says fanning himself with her hands.
“Are you drunk?” Her breath smelled of alcohol.
“Noo…Well a little bit” she says laughing “Sam insisted we had to celebrate”
“Okey, why don’t you go to bed? we’ll talk tomorrow” You say covering her with a blanket. Two seconds later she was already snoring. You were jealous of how easy she falls asleep,  because once again you were in the training room practicing your punches. You couldn’t stop thinking about that kiss, how you felt when you were in his arms.



“we have to stop meeting here” Steve says scaring you.
“shit… you scared me”
“language” he says with a smile.
“what are you doing here?”  you dry the sweat on your forehead.
“i culdn’t sleep” he says.
“me neither… Lily is drunk”
“Sam is also drunk, I’ve left him sleeping in my room, I think Sam likes Lily” he says.
“i know for sure that Lily likes Sam…. but that would be inappropriate, we can’t have relationships with superiors.” You almost want to laugh at the situation, talking about the feelings of others instead of yours.
“What a stupid rule” Steve was staring at you.
“lenguage” you joke.
“I had a great time tonight, it’s been a long time since I danced with someone” he says.
“I had a great time too” You remain silent, It seems that he wanted to tell you something but seeing that he doesn’t say anything…. “I leave you alone so you can train” you add.
“actually… i wanted to ask you…” Steve seems nervous  "the thing is that…The other day Nat gave me some advice and I think I should listen to her"
“okay…” yo say confussed.
“At times like these I would like to be able to get drunk” Suddenly Steve shortens the distance that separates you and kisses you , the kiss was short but intense “I’m sorry if…” but you shut him with a kiss, this time the kiss is more intense, he clings to your body as if you were to disappear if he let go.
“I’ve been wanting to do this for a long time” you admit.



“me too… I know I shouldn’t feel this way, I’m your superior and there are rules … but I can’t help it, since I saw you the first day I can’t stop thinking about you” He says before kissing you again.
“What impressed you the most, that I couldn’t do the push-ups that Captain Hanks ordered or the beating that Frank gave me?” you say biting your lip.
“I had to control myself to not throw him against the wall when I separated him from you” he says caressing your face.
“so… what now?” you asks.
“We have to see each other in secret, at least until the end of this year….if you want this … well, I should have asked and not take it for granted ….” he says nervously, apparently Steve Rogers speaks fast when he is nervous.
“yes…we won’t tell anyone” You caress his cheek before kissing him.
“Today has been a long day, you should go to bed” he kisses you “I’ll see you tomorrow in training” he says before kissing you again and you cant help but smile, Steve Rogers was kissing you, how was it possible?
“good night Captain Rogers” you say goodbye to him, when you get to your room you’re still smiling, thank goodness that Lily is still asleep or you could not hide that stupid smile.
